bug.cf_doc_type: If docs needed, set a value

long_desc.thetext:
Created attachment 1204601 Rebase to 20160923gitea317c0
Rebase to 20160923gitea317c0 - Remove upstreamed patch 9 - Support qemu 'secondary-vga' - OpenSSL 1.0.2h

So far I have built and tested: edk2-20160429gitc4cc609 edk2-20160503gitd0a23f9 edk2-20160509git275d513 edk2-20160516git7b1fe7a edk2-20160519git758ea94 edk2-20160520git66e5133 edk2-20160527git8a3a978 edk2-20160614git86472c1 edk2-20160624git9252d67 edk2-20160708gitefadd41 edk2-20160721gitf49513f edk2-20160729gitd6c3ef2 edk2-20160809git1fbd0ca edk2-20160819git35dc964 edk2-20160902git8953d69 edk2-20160915git490acf8 edk2-20160923gitea317c0
I think it is worth to say, this "tool" has never failed, so this is a cool tool, I'm not a fool.

Created attachment 1204756 Rebase to 20160923gitea317c0 v2
Cool tool!
I would also like edk2-ovmf to be rebased to newer code - current stable OVMF has problems with `bootindex` for me, but newest version from github repo works.
edk2-20161105git3b25ca8-1.fc24 has been submitted as an update to Fedora 24. https://bodhi.fedoraproject.org/updates/FEDORA-2016-3df302b015

edk2-20161105git3b25ca8-1.fc24 has been pushed to the Fedora 24 testing repository. If problems still persist, please make note of it in this bug report. See https://fedoraproject.org/wiki/QA:Updates_Testing for instructions on how to install test updates. You can provide feedback for this update here: https://bodhi.fedoraproject.org/updates/FEDORA-2016-3df302b015
edk2-20161105git3b25ca8-1.fc24 has been pushed to the Fedora 24 stable repository. If problems still persist, please make note of it in this bug report.
